description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: The CM Download Manager  WordPress plugin before 2.9.0 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins unpublish downloads via a CSRF attack

El complemento CM Download Manager de WordPress anterior a 2.9.0 no tiene comprobaciones CSRF en algunos lugares, lo que podría permitir a los atacantes hacer que los administradores registrados anulen la publicación de las descargas mediante un ataque CSRF.
